website_summaries.verdict: Most of those who tried the Mizuno Wave Sky admired the shoe’s high level of cushioning, as well as the plush and flexible ride. It has the right amount of underfoot protection for short and long-distance runs. This road shoe is packed with reliable technologies that deliver a good combination of comfort, stability, and performance.
pros: According to some runners, the Mizuno Wave Sky has the right amount of cushioning needed for long-distance running
Several runners admired the comfortable feel of the shoe
Some wearers noticed that the shoe required no break-in period
A good number of users admired the versatility of the Mizuno Wave Sky
they said that it’s also good for walking, gym training, and as a casual shoe
A couple of testers lauded the good-looking design and the available colorways
Most of the runners admired the responsive feel of the Wave Sky
Based on some user reviews, the shoe was able to provide a great amount of support
It runs true to size, based on some comments
cons: The Mizuno Wave Sky is slightly expensive, based on a few reviews
The shoe has a narrow toe-box, said some users
it apparently didn’t give enough space for natural toe-spread

customer_reviews.title: Throw away your old running shoes and buy a pair of Wave Sky's.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, best pair of running shoes I have ever owned. Best pair of athletic shoes I have ever owned. Walk, no RUN, to the keyboard and order you a pair RIGHT NOW! Since I got my first pair I have now ordered 6 more pairs in same and different colors. The cushioning is superior, and the stability is excellent. As a late-comer to the running game, I may get tired, my lungs may burn, my legs may tire, but my feet NEVER hurt. These things are an 11 on a scale of 1-10. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Smaller and narrow than another model from Mizuno.
customer_reviews.text: They feel narrow. I get the impression that I could have ordered 1/2 larger number or Wide. If you have a wide foot, this model is not for you. They are very comfortable from the heel. I bought them because they were at a good price ( almost 60% off).
customer_reviews.author: Fuerza Regia

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno  is a great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 pair of Mizuno Wave Sky running shoes at same time, only difference was color. Loved the style of shoes but were too narrow in toe area and had to be returned. Then discovered the shoes were from 2 different vendors, Mizuno and Zappos. Was able to return Zappos at no cost thru Amazon, Mizuno had to be returned to their location at a cost of $12. Will pay more attention next time to vendors policy. I am a Amazon prime member.
customer_reviews.author: Jan E.

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate color
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing more hurtful than when you are cheated online. I paid a premium price for these running shoes, over a $100. and I expected to get exactly the color shoe they advertise . It was Not. The picture shoes the bottom to be Yellow, but the shoes came with Green color bottoms. If I wanted to get an Anycolor shoe I could have got me a $40 pair of running shoe. Very disappointed. in their false advertising. keep lying to people lets see where it takes you.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm55

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, and rubs the heal.
customer_reviews.text: Good support, my knee pain stopped, it usually does with the Mizunos however I have never had the waive runners. This being my first time having the wave runners I've noticed they are very narrow! And I used them in the gym today and my left heal has a very nasty blister 😢. The shoe rubs badly at the back like it's too short so when I step it's like I'm taking the back of the shoe on and off. I love Mizunos but not this pair. If you have narrow feet have at it, I can't suggest what to do about the rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: YoKo

customer_reviews.title: Best Running Shoe Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Mizuno running shoes I've owned (back-to-back purchases, this pair replaced a worn-out pair). I've tried every brand of running shoe in my lifetime, and quite frankly nearly all have been "good." These Mizuno's are a step above all of the others...great support, great fit, well made, and crazy comfortable. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Will C.

customer_reviews.title: Superb Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Mizumo Wave Sky Running Shoe is a only recent discovery for me: hitherto I only used Nike Air Max, and, though their appearance in most cases left much to be desired—they looked like insects—I found them very comfortable. But Mizumo's shoes are a whole category above Nike's Air Max, for they provide support that is nothing short of exceptional, and at a considerably better price. I highly recommend these outstanding shoes to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Franchetti

customer_reviews.title: Not as tough built or shock absorbing/comfortable as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Have only used for a couple months and seems to be built to last at first but maybe too heavy and it’s already starting to get hard on my feet to be honest when running/walking. The rear material rubbed on my ankle once and it shattered. Destroyed the dam shoes very fast. Never had this issue with my adidas boost so I would recommend that instead.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. De Carli

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great cushion shoe. Unfortunately, I underpronate and this shoe has solved that problem along with giving me enough bounce. I've ran miles in this and haven't experienced any foot, shin, knee, or leg problems.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great Support and Cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I was leary at first with the posts indicating the smaller toe area than expected, but I bought them anyway. The toe area was no problem and I have wide toes. I am very pleased with the support and cushioning of the shoe. After wearing them for a few days without running, I ran the 5K and the shoes were better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Justinto237

customer_reviews.title: Solid running sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband for Christmas and he loves them. My brother runs in them and recommended them. Husband was previously running in athletic “looking” sneakers he bought for $10 off amazon and his feet we’re starting to hurt (duh!). He couldn't believe the difference. I think I’ve convinced him to invest in good sneakers going forward. These are a wonderful sneaker for a good price. Invest in your feet people!
customer_reviews.author: Krastan

customer_reviews.title: Nice light workout shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice light workout shoes, I originally purchased these for work but found 12 hours these are a little hard on my body. Thought they might be a good replacement for the Wave Prophecy's per reviews. Still a comfortable and wearable shoe just not for work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: I love Mizuno Wave running shoes, these are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have Mizuno Wave Rider 19, size 7 M, and its perfect fit, and really comfortable, so i wanted a second pair of Mizuno because it was torn on the left toe (the know issue with that model), and in my research i found Mizuno Wave Sky, this is also nice pair and claim to be more comfortable because of extra cushioning than Mizuno Wave Rider so i ordered the same size 7 M, but it runs smaller so replaced it with 7.5 M and it fits better
customer_reviews.author: danish imam

customer_reviews.title: I waited too long
customer_reviews.text: I had been interested in trying a pair of Mizunos for a long time, and yet, kept buying Asics. My Gel Kayano 19's are toast and the Asics 1000 I have been using are just not great in any dimension (fit, support, comfort, flexibility). The Mizuno Wave Sky has been, from the moment I tried them on, simply perfect. Super comfortable, good balance of bounce/squish, excellent fit, flexible and good looking. I'm betting my next pair will be Mizunos too.
customer_reviews.author: Gaston Leyack

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these. He needed running shoes and ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. He needed running shoes and is flat footed. He used to get shin splints and hasn’t since using these.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany83

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nimbus user from version 7 to 20 but now I really like these sky at the same level and even better in stability that if you buy size your usual because they are very wide in the part of the fingers recommended
customer_reviews.author: SANTY

customer_reviews.title: but still like to keep a pair of support shoes available just ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably my last Mizuno shoe with over compensated support. I've moved toward a more minimalist shoe, but still like to keep a pair of support shoes available just in case. When it comes to support running shoes, Mizuno is the best, but I'm hopeful they'll work on integrating back into the minimalist market, as their selections have been slim in the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. This is my second year living in them. I have been an Asics Kyano girl for 10 years and last year tried this shoe in addition to my Kyanos. After a foot injury healed this was my go to for cushion on my feet. When the time came for new sneakers, I bought 2 pairs of these and no Asics. Thrilled
customer_reviews.author: Robin B

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not durable, it came with a manufacturing defect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on November 2018 and by the time of February of 2019, that is, only 2 months after ordered, two holes, for each pair, has appeared so that I am now unable to use it. I do not know why, but it happened. It appears that it came with some issue, a manufacturing one. Now, I am trying to contact Mizuno in order to get my money back or to replace to a new item because the one that I have ordered is useless. I am fully sad with this order!
customer_reviews.author: Olavo Alexandrino

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, no need for inserts!
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno makes the most durable running shoe that I have ever worn. They were already laced and ready to go brand new right out of the box. Thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bama Den

customer_reviews.title: so far, so goog
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st pair of Mizuno. I [was] a Loyal Asics Nimbus wearer since model 14.. Last 3 series have gotten progressively smaller and the smaller they got, the more frustrated I got.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Best Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno running shoes are best in business! They last longer than other brands and as a runner I never had shin splints like other brands! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: MedicCapt

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno delivers quality and repeatedly excellent fit. I have ordered size 8 for 4+ years from Mizuno and they have ALL been perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett N. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: great support
customer_reviews.text: I was relunctant to purchase them at first but so glad I did. I bought a second pair after receiving and wearing them for a few days. I constantly have foot and knee pain but I do not experience any foot and knee pain while walking with these. totally thrilled and relieved with to have these. I love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this brand and type last over two years and these began degrading noticeably in under 3 months. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: I enjoy things

customer_reviews.title: Happy Blue Sky Runner~!
customer_reviews.text: A flat our great shoe! Out of the box ready to run. Just had a PR with these new shoes. I have been running for 20 + years and these could be the best fitting shoes out of the box. Feel like they are broke in from the start. Nice light shoe made for running on asphalt or cement. If you are going to run trails these might not be for you as there is very little deep grove tread.
customer_reviews.author: Joe V.

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned comfort walking/running
customer_reviews.text: I've owned five pairs of Sayonara 4's and was looking for a bit more support and cushioned comfort. This shoe fits the bill for me with intent to wear it throughout the day rather than just single purpose. Love the Mizuno fit on my feet. Will buy more now that I've tried this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Chiberia

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were like running on clouds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as they were rated top 3 shoe for large runners on independent site. They also were an affordable price. And the rating was spot on. I feel like I am running on clouds and were still pretty lighy weight. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Arias

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I have found for everyday use and walking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoe i have EVER worn
customer_reviews.text: WOW... I usually run in the Mizuno Inspire. But these I bought for general use and I wish that I was a neutral runner as these would be my choice.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kwon Hoo

customer_reviews.title: Instead of Brooks Beast for Big Guy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe so far. I dont think however it will hold up as well as the Brooks Beast, just because the sole feels softer. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Impressed

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this style for a couple of years now, and I really like this shoe! My workday has a lot of standing and walking, so I need a shoe with good support and heel cushioning. Amazon cycles through deep discounts on this shoe, so whenever I find them discounted, I order a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R. Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. I find them to be very comfortable. It is hard for me to find shoes that fit well as my feet are pretty narrow but my toes are not.
customer_reviews.author: e. krohn

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion
customer_reviews.text: Imho, more cushioned than Hoka and Brooks for running. 1st pair lasted 700 miles and 2nd pair is currently at 400 miles. These r my 3rd pair. Will continue to buy this model until they stop selling them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: very durable and comfortable. Put close to 800 miles of running on ...
customer_reviews.text: these shoes have served me well in the past,very durable and comfortable. Put close to 800 miles of running on them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes. I’m not a runner, but wear these shoes,frequently. As a moderate pronator, I find this shoe to improve stability. The cushioning is also very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: JennW.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but a solid shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno shoes tend to fit small compared to Nikes and other brands. I like the overall level of support for walking and running.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew RK

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes feel great. Good arch support. Light and expand to adjust to your feet quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: A great running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I run four miles a day, six days a week. These Mizuno Wave Sky are awesome. Thanks Mizuno.
customer_reviews.author: atgio

customer_reviews.title: Size 12 perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and I plan to buy another color of the same shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Just as expected was not let down at all. So worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Extremely happy

customer_reviews.title: it's defected/ visible made different  left and right size
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe fits different than left one!!! I should have get a refund, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jiri Stanek

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Mizuno for several years now but this was a change from the Wave Rider to the Sky. Love the amount of cushion and support. I have not logged enough miles to compare durability but definitely feel increased comfort with the Sky.
customer_reviews.author: Pastortodhuston

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and extremely comfortable. I am a big guy and they absorb a lot of the shocks that would otherwise kill my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are replacement shoes that i owned for way too long. 5 star
customer_reviews.author: kc135rpilot

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They were extremely comfortable out of the box, and have remained so after about 50 miles of use.
customer_reviews.author: TheBishop

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Use to walk 2 to 3 miles a day.
customer_reviews.author: R. Scharr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running show
customer_reviews.text: Laced it up and immediately ran 5.5 miles. Now that's a great shoe, no "break-in" necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best running shoe I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Steve Friedland

customer_reviews.title: Super confortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes, after 4 different brands of shoes in two months I finally can say that I found the best ones.
customer_reviews.author: Charly Munzo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome shoes, highly recommend, great seller, very fast delivery, exceptional comfort
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, I've been wearing these for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I've been wearing these for a few months and just finished up an eight-day trip hiking around Peru with them. Feet never felt sore though they might be a little heavy for speed over a long distance.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe, very confortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe, very confortable. I am Highly satisfied. Great quality! I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Ramdane C.

customer_reviews.title: very nice feel, good cushion when running and I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Run a bit narrow, and had to return the first pair. Otherwise, very nice feel, good cushion when running and I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: AROD

customer_reviews.title: High quality shoes for a low price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of Mizuno and as expected, it’s a very good running shoes
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: A good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've been running on Mizunos for several years, and like all my Mizunos these are comfortable and well made. I look forward to many miles.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: I am a Mizuno fan and really like the way the new Wave Sky Running Shoe fits
customer_reviews.text: I am a Mizuno fan and really like the way the new Wave Sky Running Shoe fits! Also the shoe arrived on time and in great shape. Thanks you.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying these shoes. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second pair of these shoes because my first pair was so comfortable. They would have lasted a long time if I hadn’t worn them at a campfire and burned a hole in the side.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe. Wider in the toe-box compared to Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The support of a combat military boot dress up as sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable lightweight extreme support I use them to work 10 hours at a time on my feet absolutely not complain at all
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Great supportive shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and feel. My flat feet do great in 12 hour days in these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable. Snug at toe first, perfect in a day.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Riesen

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Fits
customer_reviews.text: If the shoe fits... well, yes - it does. No hassle shopping, so long as you know your brand and size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these to run daily, and says they are decent for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Anastacia B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm female an wear 8.5 bought the men size 7. They are comfortable and fit perfect. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for the pronator!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of cushion and more bounce than a typical motion control shoe.
customer_reviews.author: ameinguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes for heavy runners. Nice large toe box.
customer_reviews.author: craig bowman

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Excelent shoes. Maybe I need to loosen it a little bit by using it more
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: great shoe , great deal
customer_reviews.text: usually it cost $70 and up but this time they sold it for $50 so great value for great price.
customer_reviews.author: USHA PINHAS

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have found another pair
customer_reviews.text: One of my go to trainers. Happy to have found another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rick J Brauer

customer_reviews.title: They are not heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice color!!The picture look greenish but they are dark blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cushioning.
customer_reviews.text: I had tested it to run for 6 Km. Good cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Lim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable shoe I ever worn in my life. I walk and stand alot at work. This shoe is perfect. It's so comfortable to walk and stand in this shoe. I have no problem with this shoe so far. Like them alot. They look good too.
customer_reviews.author: denny

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just a little smaller than I have on another of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hosedragger

customer_reviews.title: The light weight material does not offer much support for ...
customer_reviews.text: The light weight material does not offer much support for the sides of your feet. Definitely not for lateral movements. May just take a while to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Ann Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe’s but because I was unaware of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe’s but because I was unaware of the sizing issue, I am stuck with does I truly like but cannot wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mizuno Men's Wave Sky Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Maximum cushioning meets maximum comfort in the new Wave Sky, built for neutral runners. A full length U4icX midsole works in harmony with new cloud wave technology for a plush and lively ride.
feature_bullets: All new Mizuno Smooth Ride: New maximum cloud wave technology coupled with a full length, articulated U4icX midsole delivers a plush and flexible ride
New thicker and premium anatomical sock liner for improved fit and comfort
U4icX Strobel lining for added comfort
Mizuno Dynamotion Fit: 3 panel upper construction
Engineered midfoot sock-like panel and lightweight forefoot mesh for support and a disappearing fit
